prevention.pageSubtitle: Protect yourself and your family from malaria

nets.title: Use Mosquito Nets
nets.desc: Insecticide-treated nets are your best defense against malaria-carrying mosquitoes.
nets.tip1: Sleep under a treated net every night
nets.tip2: Ensure nets have no holes or tears

spray.title: Indoor Residual Spraying
spray.desc: Regular indoor spraying kills mosquitoes and prevents malaria transmission.
spray.tip1: Allow health workers to spray your home
spray.tip2: Don't wash walls for 6 months after spraying

clothing.title: Protective Clothing
clothing.desc: Cover up during peak mosquito hours (dusk to dawn).
clothing.tip1: Wear long sleeves and pants in the evening
clothing.tip2: Use mosquito repellent on exposed skin

environment.title: Environmental Control
environment.desc: Eliminate mosquito breeding sites around your home.
environment.tip2: Clear bushes and tall grass near homes
